channel.title: OpenFOAM on CodeBlue
channel.description: Recent content in OpenFOAM on CodeBlue

item.title: Creating your own OpenFOAM solver
item.description: AIM: The aim of this project is to create a custom solver in OpenFOAM that solves a transport equation for a scalar named s. OBJECTIVES: The solver must be modified from icoFoam which is present in $FOAM/applications/solvers/incompressible/icoFoam. The case should be a scalar quantity ’s’ that is being transported by velocity u and the transport equation is represented by {del u }/{del t } + nabla. (us) = 0 The case must be modified from $FOAM_TUTORIALS/incompressible/icoFoam/cavity.
